oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.binning

Class BinningConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.binning.BinningConfig

  • public class BinningConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the configuration for creating spatial binning.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BinningConfig.BinShape
      The shape of the cells to be generated

      • CONF_CELL_SHAPE

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_CELL_SHAPE
        Job configuration: the shape of the cells. Expected values: a string representation of any value of BinningConfig.BinShape
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_CELL_WIDTH

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_CELL_WIDTH
        Job configuration: The width of the cells as a double value
        See Also:

      • CONF_GRID_COLS

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_GRID_COLS
        Job configuration: The number of columns in the grid as an integer number. This value is calculated automatically when the cell size and the grid MBR are specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:

      • CONF_GRID_ROWS

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_GRID_ROWS
        Job configuration: The number of rows in the grid as an integer number. This value is calculated automatically when the cell size and the grid MBR are specified.
